reviewText: Not sure why this was not made clear in the product info, but my kids literally tore the box open (the discs were untouched)  so I cannot return it and it won't play at all. I read on some other products about foreign DVDs not being compatible, so I assume that's the case here. My DVD player just doesn't even acknowledge that there is a disc in the player. I tried all the discs of course. Same thing. Money down the drain
